mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Users (email, password, nickname, profile_image, bio, role) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{profileImage}, #{bio}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE Users SET nickname = #{nickname}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, bio = #{bio}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Users WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Users WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Comments WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM Users WHERE email = #{email})
DELETE FROM Likes WHERE user_id = (SELECT id FROM Users WHERE email = #{email})
